sentences.sContent: Because of interservice communication, one public API-layer update method can invoke another public API-layer update method.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of interservice communication, one public API-layer update method can invoke another public API-layer update method.
sentences.sCn: 由于执行服务之间的通信，一个公共 API 层更新方法可以调用另一个公共 API 层更新方法。
